title: Star Guardian Lulu Bug
body:
Whenever I get out of a game using the Star Guardian Lulu skin, Aatrox is shown in the post game screen picture. 

To repeat,

1) Play Lulu on in normal on summoner's rift in the Star Guardian Lulu skin.

2) End game.

3) See picture

replies.body:
Hey there, thanks for the report! 

Unfortunately, this isn't specific to Star Guardian Lulu, and I believe has to do with an error with loading post-game data. Since Aatrox is the first champion, and first card in this folder, it pulls that, as opposed to the proper card. ;_; We're looking into it!
